FuncDef: This command designates one of the configured ports of the LAG to be used on egress as either a primary or secondary link (based on the option selected) by all SAPs and network interfaces that use this LAG link map profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a physical port ID that is an existing member of this LAG.
Designates one of the configured ports of the LAG to be used on egress as a primary link by SAPs/network interfaces that use this LAG link map profile.
Designates one of the configured ports of the LAG to be used on egress as a secondary link by SAPs/network interfaces that use this LAG link map profile.
